name: 2 Player Shooter (Dr. Dark)
description:
This game should be played by two players.

Player 1 shoots with SPACEBAR and controls with WSAD.

Player 2 shoots with NUM0 and controls with ARROW KEYS.

Sounds are not done because I am still learn about implementing sounds.

The red square should get you back to the menu.

Thankx for playing. Please leave a comment. It helps a lot.
